item.title: How to cleanup a Gluster Heketi volume
item.description: Currently, I’m using gluster + heketi in my kubernetes cluster to give a persistent storage service on demand. I know that there are other options to implement simliar service, like a rooks using ceph.

item.title: Embedding asciinema cast in your Hugo site
item.description: Often, I use asciinema as a tool to show a specific command result or to explain step by step some linux setup, commonly runned in my terminal.

item.title: How setup Haproxy with zero downtime reload from code source
item.description: if you are looking for a modern load balancer with zero downtime when you need to reload its configuration, HAProxy 1.8 and Linux kernel >=3.

item.title: Recovery admin password for grafana
item.description: For some reason, you lost your grafana admin password. So, if you’ve been using sqlite as your grafana backend storage, to recovery this password is easy.

item.title: Using a custom openconnect version for VPN
item.description: My company use the Palo Alto Networks solution to offer a VPN service for their employees. Personally, I prefer to use Openvpn when I need to setup a VPN connection.

item.title: Manage TLS Certificates for Kubernetes users
item.description: Intro Probably, after to create your kubernetes cluster you will need to create access for other users, and for accomplish this task, you need to create certificates to authentication against the kube-apiserver service.
